modmenu.descriptionTranslation.autosell: Mod to automatically sell items to villagers.
modmenu.autosell.settings.title: AutoSell Mod Settings
modmenu.autosell.settings.general.title: General
modmenu.autosell.settings.general.highli: Last processed by the mod villager will emit particles
Useful for mass sale in order not to forget where have you stopped.
modmenu.autosell.settings.general.trades: Delays between trade operations (in ticks, from §60§r to §6210§r)
Increasing delays can help if trades occur only visually or if you're getting kicked for spamming.
modmenu.autosell.settings.general.accept: How many times can the price increase so that the trade is considered acceptable (for mode §aON§r, §eACCEPTABLE PRICES§r)
For example, §61.5 = 150%§r. So if the price was §64§r emeralds, then §64 * 1.5 = 6§r emeralds is the maximum acceptable price.
Multiplier can also be less than §61§r. In case if you want to buy things only at a discount.
modmenu.autosell.settings.general.proces: Trades which will be processed if possible
Item names must be in-game identifiers, like §a"pumpkin"§r, §a"minecraft:emerald"§r or §a"end_stone_brick_stairs"§r.
Item names can't contain spaces ( ), but they can contain digits (§60-9§r).
Item names can be written with explicit namespaces like §a"minecraft:something"§r.
modmenu.autosell.settings.effects.title: Effects
modmenu.autosell.settings.effects.highli: What particles to use for villager highlighting
modmenu.autosell.settings.effects.partic: How many particles will be spawned at every tick
For example, value = 2 means 2 particles per tick or 40 particles per second.
Value = 0.5 means 1 particle every 2 ticks, 0.01 - 1 particle every 100 ticks, etc.
Height of the center of particles sphere/cuboid
In what shape will the particles be distributed
If True, uses speed below as an upper speed bound
If False, uses speed below as an actual fixed speed
Controls the speed of the particles
